subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
Fines (Penalties)
lead_paragraph: Miami guard Dwyane Wade was fined $5,000 after a review showed that he had exaggerated a foul during Game 2 of the finals that was charged to San Antonio’s Manu Ginobili.
snippet: Miami guard Dwyane Wade was fined $5,000 after a review showed that he had exaggerated a foul during Game 2 of the finals that was charged to San Antonio’s Manu Ginobili.
